extends java.lang.Object
implements ISubject, java.io.Serializable

        public Car(java.lang.String registration,
           java.lang.String make,
           java.lang.String model,

           java.lang.Integer mileage,
           java.time.LocalDate serviceDue,
           TypeOfVehicle typeOfVehicle,
           java.lang.Boolean toBeSold)
        Constructor for the car object
        Parameters:
        registration - car registration
        make - car make
        model - model of car
        isAvailable - if the car is available to rent or not
        isUnderRepair - if the car is currently in repair
        mileage - the mileage of the car
        serviceDue - if a service is due for the car
        typeOfVehicle - the type of car that it is
        toBeSold - if the car is waiting to be sold
